ValidationRule.description: Either the First Call Resolution or the Follow Up Needed field must be checked, in order to select a picklist value for the Contact Reason field, for Handbook Support HRE/CHB Ref Object record type ONLY.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (First_Call_Resolution__c = FALSE), (Follow_Up_Needed__c = FALSE), ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Contact_Reason__c, '')) ), ( RecordType.Name = "Service Support HRE/CHB Ref Object" ), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check either the First Call Resolution or Follow Up Needed field.
